website_summaries.verdict: This stainless steel funnel is the most popular in the market thanks to its high-quality materials and multi-use capabilities.
pros: It has a bright, clean finish and its durability offers years of use
The multifunctional funnel comes with a detachable strainer
Perfect for transporting liquids, rebottling, or adding ingredients
It's easy to clean, and comes with a lifetime warranty
cons: The holes could be smaller to filter out residue, and it's not as good for dry ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Product is good. Price? Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. For that, I give it 4 stars. I bought this on a lightning deal and I'll call it what it was...an impulse buy. I could use a funnel for olive oil and whatnot. Today, it's on sale as a Lightning Deal for even less than what I paid. On top of that, I found it at a major discount home goods type store for under $5.00. So, shame on me for the impulse buy. Sometimes, these deals aren't as good as they seem.
customer_reviews.author: SoundsLikeTina

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dry ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well for dry ingredients which is what I bought it for. There is not a smooth transition from the upper section to the lower section which causes dry goods to "catch" on the lip and not flow smoothly. Also, you can't really tell from the pictures but the lower section is folded in on itself which causes a restriction. I have tried to use this funnel to fill my peppermills with peppercorns and it fails miserably. It might work okay for liquids but not for dry ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: I like the strainer insert and imagine it will make cleanup ...
customer_reviews.text: Caught this on a lightning deal and have been impressed with the quality. I like the strainer insert and imagine it will make cleanup much simpler. Bought it on a whim and now imagine it'll have a long life in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: Another poorly designed idea for otherwise a simple device
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is my fault for not noticing from the displayed pictured, but the tip of the funnel which goes in containers is straight, It makes it harder to slide narrower openings. Most funnels start thick then thin so they can be inserted into smaller rims. With this one, you get just one chance, if it is too big to go in, then you have to find another, but I'm not wasting more money on a second thinner tip....
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Bakhaazi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for filling my wine bottle with oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pour my used Grape Seed Oil in a wine bottle for re-use later. I like the filter for cleaning the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mays

customer_reviews.title: Well Made with heavy duty stainless.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made heavy duty stainless funnel, Not some cheap product. It's truly is a Heavy Duty Stainless Funnel. It replaced my rusted metal one I had been using. The filter is a nice added feature that my old one lacked.
customer_reviews.author: george&pat

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Sort of weird for a guy to say he loves a funnel but I wanted to give a 5 star rating due to the workmanship on such a low priced funnel! It doesn't even have to be so well made, I have surgical tools that are not as good so keep up the error proofing. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I would not have expected to be thrilled with a funnel, but here I am. The perforated-plate filter works great and is easy to remove and clean. The ridge in the stem does make it a little harder to clean, but guarantees that air can escape from the container while you pour. The metal is a good weight--not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over think it.
customer_reviews.text: You’re not buying a car. Don’t over think it. It’s not a rubber funnel that will break. It’s not going to become a family heirloom. It’s a funnel. It funnels things like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Darko

customer_reviews.title: unexpectedly useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this funnel on a whim, but it has turned out to be even more useful than I expected. Recently, I made a ginger and honey beverage to soothe my hoarse throat--for a 6-hour training I was presenting. I needed to strain out the ginger slices as I transferred the liquid to a water bottle and this funnel was perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Word Maven

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I like this funnel so far! I love that it has a strainer, but I wish it could've been a finer mesh strainer. Beggars can't be choosers, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Vader D

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It’s start having those brown spot on it on the second use. Other than that it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Yarly Romain

customer_reviews.title: Look for one made of better stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Today is May 20th.....I've been using this since April 27th.....ITS ALREADY STARTING TO RUST where the cone attaches to the funnel. I'm still in the window of return so I can send it back. Look for one made of better stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Use it for making iced coffee and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Use it for making iced coffee and it's a nice, reliable, sturdy product. It feels like it will last 100 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Funnel with Strainer
customer_reviews.text: This funnel with the strainer is awesome!! It is great for straining fish grease when I fry fillets and don't want to throw away good oil just because it has crumbs in it. I pour it through this funnel and have clean oil for the next time I fry fish. I strongly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good funnel with a good strainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I especially love the strainer it has.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Koletas

customer_reviews.title: Stainless strainer
customer_reviews.text: A MUST for someone that fries veggies in oil, it takes all the left over crumbs and again your oil is CLEAN... never had one of these before, but this is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: anniecat

customer_reviews.title: Just right to fill the reservoir on my new Cuisinart ...
customer_reviews.text: Just right to fill the reservoir on my new Cuisinart coffee maker.which is a little difficult to just pour into with put spilling....
customer_reviews.author: Alice B

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get away from all the plastic. Loving stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: LadyImara

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This was a Christmas gift for my mom
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This was a Christmas gift for my mom. It did not include the filter, which was the reason for the purchase. Since it was ordered for Christmas two months ago, i can't return... totally waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Stainless funnel
customer_reviews.text: This funnel meets my needs and the removable screen is a nice feature. I use this in my brewing process and it has been a good addition to my brewing equipement.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I paid a few extra dollars for this funnel. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and just works.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product. strainer removes easily for cleaning. even strains fish oil fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for making almond milk and cleaners!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how much I like this! I make my own cleaners and almond milk and find I am using it all the time! I like that I don't worry chemicals leaching into my milk!
customer_reviews.author: Ooshop

customer_reviews.title: Threw out plastic ones. This one is a winner ...
customer_reviews.text: Threw out plastic ones. This one is a winner for all types of uses. Will buy another for garage jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsplace

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this funnel 3 times and the prong on the filter piece broke. Don’t waste your money on this. It does not filter very good either. I would actually give it a zero star.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: The funnel is fine but did no receive the strainer
customer_reviews.text: The funnel is fine but did no receive the strainer, main reason we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea combination!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and wonderfully useful! I have already used this funnel and I look forward to using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Does nice job
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping smaller particles out of jar. Will not clean/filter oil but does what it is supposed to do Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: MIKE SZOMBATFALVY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for getting liquid into smaller bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love the large mouth and small exit end. Filter works great for putting oil infusion into smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured/described
customer_reviews.text: Funnel is supposed to have a strainer for used cooking oil, but does not.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use !! No more mess !!! Love that it's stainless steel !! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy clements

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: screen could be a bit finer to catch the small particles
customer_reviews.author: John Modiri

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for lavender so far and have plans to start making more oils and tinctures. It's high quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect funnel with the strainer that can be removed. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MoonBeamDreamZ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive the strainer which is what I really bought this for so I just have a funnel

customer_reviews.title: Good funnel
customer_reviews.text: Well made stainless steel funnel of fair price and good looks.

customer_reviews.title: ... always wanting a funnel and this one is of good
customer_reviews.text: Im always wanting a funnel and this one is of good quality

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean and unlike plastic is sterile--nothing sticks to it
customer_reviews.text: All metal with removable strainer. Easy clean and unlike plastic is sterile--nothing sticks to it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice..but doesn't fit homebrew EZ Cap bottles
customer_reviews.text: Good quality... however slightly too large to fit in EZ Cap bottles. Had to use pliers to pinch small funnel ens

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift and the person using it loves it

customer_reviews.title: Great funnel!
customer_reviews.text: Great funnel! Use the strainer when reclaiming fry oil, works great.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who distills his own beer and moonshine. He loves this funnel. Great product, sturdy and it comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: AccrualCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a new funnel and this one works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: It's a funnel.
customer_reviews.text: It's a funnel. It works just like a funnel should. That's a good thing.

customer_reviews.title: nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: a little bigger than I thought! but works , nice quality!

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and large enough you can put in a small coffee filter if you want a fine filtration.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality funnel.I thought it would fit my flasks but it does not, to big.
customer_reviews.author: Kchawk

customer_reviews.title: Strainer and funnel
customer_reviews.text: Works well for straining debris from soup mixture or broth.
customer_reviews.author: RFK

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Funnel
customer_reviews.text: We use this for bottling up Kombucha. It does a great job, and the built in strainer helps to keep debris from getting inside the bottle. Very well built and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus C

customer_reviews.title: Funnel
customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy when I need to pour something into another container, it doesn't spill.
customer_reviews.author: Candaisy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great funnel strainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great funnel strainer, it is easy to use and clean. You can easily detach the strainer by pulling the top piece the sticks out. I think it is worth the buy and is very versatile. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, just wish it had a finer strainer in it.
customer_reviews.author: DDH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  The strainer fits in the funnel perfectly with no gaps and stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The strainer fits in the funnel perfectly with no gaps and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for what I need! Very well made and sturdy. I look forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: RovingHogan

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this funnel. Had plastic ones in the past this one is much better. And won't stain.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Has a crease around the funnel that prevents complete funneling of contents, specifically powders are a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just fine and I like it because it is stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely designed funnel. The built-in, removable filter, is perfect for draining oil from a pan and catching the solids. We fry plantains regularly and then reuse the oil. This funnel will catch the solids and then allow them to be discarded. It is dishwasher-safe so it's easy to clean. I especially like the fact that the filter piece can be easily removed when you only want it to act like a funnel. The only superfluous thing about this item is the loop on the outside, which is unnecessary. This is a very good purchase and an item that will stay in your kitchen for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Bocaboy

customer_reviews.title: Great funnel and a great value too.
customer_reviews.text: Great funnel. Have always wanted a good one, and this is a great value too.
customer_reviews.author: wwmike

customer_reviews.title: heads up- don't buy
customer_reviews.text: piece of junk. cheap material and cheaply make, scrape metal
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Missing the strainer
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better quality. One star because the strainer piece was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Marianela Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than we anticipated but works fine and seems to be built to last
customer_reviews.author: CLFDPOPS1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory to have around the kitchen. Should've bought one of these years ago

customer_reviews.title: Quality Funnel
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality funnel that should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: DottieK

customer_reviews.title: No strainer in box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for two reasons, it was stainless steel and it came with a detachable strainer. It is stainless steel but the strainer is nowhere to be found. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Perfect for the kitchen chores I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Perfect for the kitchen chores I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: BASM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Funnel the crease in the stem lets air escape from bottle and prevents bubble over.
customer_reviews.author: Blue heeler

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Think it'll be a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: G-d bless Prime let's me return anything that I'm not happy with.
customer_reviews.text: Miight be OK. I got one but it had a crack in the metal (mfg defect or something). Sent it back and went back to my old plastic funnels. Might work for you if not broken. G-d bless Prime let's me return anything that I'm not happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Boston MA

customer_reviews.title: Bent Where it Shouldn't Be
customer_reviews.text: The material does not seem as heavy duty as it's mentioned from the description. But the main problem is that the spout is bent in, and while this does not exactly detract from its use... I'd prefer to make my own unsightly dents instead of getting a pre-damaged product- thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectrically Sane

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this item yet, but it seems perfect for transferring (cooking) oils and has a removable drain in it. the opening is a bit larger than I expected, so I won't be able to use in on smaller bottles (such as essential oils). I might also be able to use it to strain gravy since it has the removable piece.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid stainless steel funnel and very helpful tool in our kitchen now. The removable filter makes it easier to clean the funnel tube. I have used it several times in our kitchen and it serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: It had a crack.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the looks of this product specially with the detachable strainer. Unfortunately when I tested it out with water I found there was a small crack on the side that caused it to pour out and thus I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Noua

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend purchasing this item
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday. It was supposed to have a strainer included. I just received the funnel. I wouldn't recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: tberner59

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for the stainless steel material and, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the stainless steel material and, more importantly, the strainer, but it came without a strainer. So...I cannot comment on how well it would work but would not have purchased had I known it was just the funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Lois F. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must to buy. It is so handy and the metal is light but very strong.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe that's supposed to be like that but liquid could run down the side
customer_reviews.text: The funnel part is bent. Maybe that's supposed to be like that but liquid could run down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 16oz flip top bottles
customer_reviews.text: Funnel itself is fine but the bottom is too big to fit in the 16-oz flip top bottles we got.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Landers

customer_reviews.title: It's okay probably better for liquids
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would come in handy to fill small containers like salt & pepper. The center part comes out but there is a small ring the prevents all granules from sliding down the tube. I think a plastic molded funnel would have worked better for my needs. If the center strainer part is left in the openings are very tiny and not very usable.
customer_reviews.author: drf

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This is Ok but the tip didn't fit into or over either flask I bought it for, so it's just another item in my kitchen drawer now.
customer_reviews.author: Cuddly Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this Stainless Steel funnel...
customer_reviews.text: It's really well made, has a nifty strainer insert, a big finger loop, shiny and pretty, plus a air space going down the tube to help it flow without backing up. It will last and hold up a long time (longer than I'll be on the planet, anyway). I'm throwing out the old plastic ones!
customer_reviews.author: WolfDogGal

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice - love the removable strainer
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes that flexible silicon funnel just doesn't do the trick. This stainless funnel is fabulous for both liquid transfer and getting bits of infused herbs, stray goat hair (yes, fresh goat milk sometimes gets a hair), and small seeds out of liquids without having to wrangle a funnel, a strainer, a bottle or two and still wind up with a mess on the kitchen counter and floor. Get one, already!
customer_reviews.author: SeldomIsHeard

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job and quickly filters the liquid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mainly to filter cooking grease back into container for storage. It does a great job and quickly filters the liquid. My only reason for 4 stars is not because of the quality - that is great - but I was hoping the holes were a little smaller to filter out the finer residue. However, I can remedy that with a coffee filter or paper towel placed inside the funnel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for a pocket-sized flask ... at least NOT mine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this funnel, primarily, so I could have an easier time filling my flask at home. This product is bigger than you think, but seems to be made of quality material. The handle is nice because it leaves options for you if you're going to carry it around, since you can hook it somewhere instead of stashing it in a bag. As for the usefulness, if you have a wider mouth flask, by that I mean a flask that probably won't fit in a pocket, then this funnel may fit. I will not be using this product as intended and I'm currently looking for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large funnel
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic funnel and I love the strainer (that removes) at the bottom. It's a great larger size, has an indentation in the tube part which helps with funneling into another container plus it's very well made! I would buy this again in a heartbeat although I'm hoping it will last forever. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Does the job !
customer_reviews.text: I make Kombucha and this funnel works great with a little tweaking. In order to get it to fit in the bottles as others suggested I had to take some pliers and squeeze the end a little to get it to fit in the neck of the bottle. Other than that it works great. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Design
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and ease of use of this funnel not to mention how easy it cleans up. Nothing to disllike. Wish I would have replace that old aluminum one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kay in MN

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to refill my coffee machine reservoir without having to take it off the machine. This allows me to do this without spilling and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Here in the ATL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone who regularly squeezes fresh citrus and doesn't want to have the seeds - or wants to strain a muddled bunch of goodies for a cocktail. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: luckymama

customer_reviews.title: Works good for pouring vodka from big bottle into small bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works good for pouring vodka from big bottle into small bottle. I haven't needed removable strainer piece for anything yet, but It will come in handy soon enough I'm sure. Good solid construction, not flimsy at all. It does not have good angle for pouring dry items. (protein power, etc...)
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for filtering and storing used fish-fryer oil. I'll place a coffee-filter in the funnel, then start straining the used oil for reuse; should work like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I brought this Stainless Steel Funnel with Detachable Strainer/Filter ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I brought this Stainless Steel Funnel with Detachable Strainer/Filter For Cooking, Essential Oils and Flask-Filling. SS is great and the detachable strainer is an added plus. I've no problem inserting/removing the strainer... fits and works like a "hand & glove."
customer_reviews.author: E. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel funnel with removable filter
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this thinking I'd lave limited opportunities to use this. Tucked it away...ended up using it the next day. It's so well made and love the removable filtering device. Fluids even thick tenacious ones flow through easily. Clean up is a breeze. Good investment! Clearly a well made item!
customer_reviews.author: T. Nicole Webb

customer_reviews.title: A 'must have'.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy liquid items in bulk, you have got to have one of these. You can recover the very last product for the large container when you use this stainless steel funnel. It last and looks super for many years. It also reminds me of my Grandmother and her kitchen. God rest her sweet soul and give me just a few of her qualities
customer_reviews.author: Super Awesome Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality funnel
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, not all thin, like it will get bent up in your drawer. The strainer is a very nice feature too. It pops right out to clean it. Its also a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Sanssouci572

customer_reviews.title: A funnel indeed it is
customer_reviews.text: It is a funnel - a stainless steel one at that. It works just like a funnel should, cleans easily. The only drawback is the strainer clogs easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howell

customer_reviews.title: This product does a great job. It is priced right and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job. It is priced right and well constructed. I would recommend heartily. A real buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bartoomann

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great funnel! Perfect for liquids although I'm going to try using it to funnel rice from a big bag into smaller plastic containers. Will amend review if it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: MG Household

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for "scratch" cooks!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this earlier in my 40+ years of cooking! Great for large particles, however still need to use in conjunction with a strainer for tea, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DBH

product_meta.title: OTHERMAX Stainless Steel Kitchen Funnel with Detachable Strainer/Filter for Transmission of Liquid, Fluid, Dry Ingredients and Powder, 5-Inch Food Grade Metal Funnel for Cooking Oil, Silver
feature_bullets: STAINLESS STEEL FUNNEL - OTHERMAX's metal funnel is made from industrial grade stainless steel that not only gives the products a bright, clean finish, it also makes them durable through years of use. Thanks to high-quality materials, you can count on these funnels to deliver long-term performance and decades of convenient pouring. Make sure you have a mini funnel that will last with this fantastic set and the kitchen will be making great meals for everyone!

FUNNEL WITH STRAINER - A detachable strainer is also included in order to filter solid from liquids just like that. Just place the strainer in the funnel during the filtering process and get ready to be amazed. A small yet might tool for filtering larger solids as wellnow there's nothing you can’t filter!

MULTIFUNCTIONAL FUNNEL - Perfect for transporting liquids quickly and accurately, rebottling, adding ingredients, jams and marmalades to storage containers; has a side handle to conveniently hold the funnel over a jar, pot or pan.

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: OTHERMAX'S Stainless steel funnel is easy to store save space, the ergonomic handle for hanging in your kitchen cabinets. It is easy to clean up after use. Just put it into dishwasher or simply wash with soapy water.

RISK FREE! 100% money-back lifetime warranty! Enjoy a smooth & frustration free experience with OTHERMAX'S 100% Lifetime warranty! We stand by our products so you can buy with confidence! Your purchase is protected. Love it or your money back, whenever and for whatever reason, period! INCREDIBLE!
